dia_brief.name: Tear
dia_brief.txt: Alright you lot, proceed to Northern Loewi's railway hub. A foreign breed of Slime has been reported in the area, likely smuggled in from a neighboring region.
With mutations to counter any possible natural predators, these augmented Slimes will destroy the ecosystem in a matter of days if left undealt with.
The objective is simple: eliminate all mutated Slimes. The Adventurer's Guild thinks this is a good way to prove your worth, so try to make a good first impression out there.

They may just be slimes, but anything can happen in the field. This request should pose little difficulty, as long as you keep your guard up.
Good luck.

dia_intro.name: Imo'lei
dia_intro.txt: Looks like this is the place.
About time too, I was about to fall asleep. Can we get a mission a little closer to home next time?

dia_intro.name: Tear
dia_intro.txt: I'll file a request to have the smugglers send their next batch of invasive species directly to your doorstep. In the meantime, get started on tracking down those slimes.
The residue left behind by slimes - especially a foreign species such as this - should be fairly easy to notice. Just follow the trails, they couldn't have gotten far.

dia_intro.name: Aile
dia_intro.txt: Um... oh! Is this a trail?

dia_intro.name: Paprika
dia_intro.txt: Aww yeah! We'll get this done lickity-split with your fancy scanners Aile!

dia_intro.name: Imo'lei
dia_intro.txt: Right, let's get this over with. I gotta hurry up and get some levels before the tournament...

dia_01.name: Imo'lei
dia_01.txt: No doubt about it, that's our little bastard.

dia_01.name: Paprika
dia_01.txt: Ha! Get ready to get butt-whooped mister slime!

dia_01.name: Imo'lei
dia_01.txt: Hmph, you just focus on keeping it distracted, chef-girl.
*I'll* be the one turning this thing into mince-meat.

dia_01.name: Imo'lei
dia_01.txt: Mince-slime, whatever, just hurry up and pull already!

dia_02.name: Imo'lei
dia_02.txt: ...Huh? Wait a sec, we've pretty much checked all over now right? But we've only found like half of them.
Aile, you sure you didn't miss anything? It's gonna be a real pain in the ass if some of 'em got away.

dia_02.name: Aile
dia_02.txt: I-I think I found the rest...
Tch... ganging up on us now, huh?
Fine, I was starting to get bored!

dia_outro.name: Imo'lei
dia_outro.txt: Alright, that should be the last of 'em, right?

dia_outro.name: Tear
dia_outro.txt: Mm, indeed. All targets confirmed routed.

dia_outro.name: Paprika
dia_outro.txt: We did it! We diiiiiiiiiid it!

dia_outro.name: Imo'lei
dia_outro.txt: Relax, would you? That was child's play, I was practically falling asleep over here.

dia_outro.name: Tear
dia_outro.txt: She's right - requests will only get more difficult from here on out.
But still, for your first mission you all performed quite well. It looks like you'll make for fine adventurers after all.

dia_outro.name: Imo'lei
dia_outro.txt: Heh, damn right I will. Let's get outta here.
